knimeNode.name: Site Search Analytics (P&G)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Query Search Console (Webmaster Tools) search data.

fullDescription.intro: Query your search traffic data with filters and parameters that you define. The method returns zero or more rows grouped by the row keys (dimensions) that you define. You must define a date range of one or more days. More information at https://developers.google.com/webmaster-tools/
fullDescription.option: query, date, page, country, device or search appearance. Not all dimensions can be used together.
Beginning date to include in query (inclusive)
Ending date to include in query (inclusive)
Number of rows to return via query. Max is 5000, default is 1000.
